channel.title: Rdr
channel.description:
Any thoughts/opinions on red dead redemption? Of course it already gains much respect because its from rockstar, but I don't if I should get it within the next hour?
Worth buying? Will the campaign last for a while?
REVIEW!1

item.title: Rdr
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I’ve had like maybe one glitch where I came into Armadillo too fast and no one was anywhere to be found, but other than that it’s all good.

Read full topic

item.title: Rdr
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:41, topic:340882”][quote author=Frell link=topic=437276.msg3224598#msg3224598 date=1275452061]

Fan boy much?

LOL GET IT CUZ XBOX OVERHEATS ALL DA TIME

I bought my 3rd xbox last Friday, apparently Microsoft finally announced they found a fix and started making the fixed ones in august. Not to mention alot of stuff on the console goes alot smoother and the controller feels loads better.
[/quote]… My 1 yr old xbox has never overheated, and it has been running 24/7 for several months…[/quote]Pretty much this for me too.

Read full topic

item.title: Rdr
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:39, topic:340882”]I just bought the game 3 days ago, and I haven’t had any problems with it freezing up. Obviously I really haven’t been in many areas, so I can’t put much input into that. I have however heard of the game freezing for people on specific missions.

So far it has been a fun game, and the multiplayer is fun to mess around in as well.[/quote]
Yea, already beat my gameplay time on gta.

Read full topic

item.title: Rdr
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I just bought the game 3 days ago, and I haven’t had any problems with it freezing up. Obviously I really haven’t been in many areas, so I can’t put much input into that. I have however heard of the game freezing for people on specific missions.

So far it has been a fun game, and the multiplayer is fun to mess around in as well.

item.title: Rdr
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:29, topic:340882”][quote author=Frell link=topic=437276.msg3224097#msg3224097 date=1275427623]

This. Game. Is. Buggy. Seriously why the fuck do they release a game that keeps freezing up?

They said it was buggy as in small buggy shit that doesn’t effect gameplay (like the rope dissapearing on a stagecoach, etc). If its freezing up your console is fucked.
[/quote]
thats a retarded statement, the game could be buggy in his instance and it actually be the game’s fault or the disc might be fucked, you cant assume the console[/quote]
If its an xbox i can.

Read full topic
